price: u njima će vječno boraviti – obećanje je Allahovo istinito, a On je silan i mudar.
arabic: خَٰلِدِينَ فِيهَاۖ وَعۡدَ ٱللَّهِ حَقّٗاۚ وَهُوَ ٱلۡعَزِيزُ ٱلۡحَكِيمُ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: khālidīna fīhā waʿda al-lahi ḥaqqan wahuwa al-ʿazīzu al-ḥakīmu
